I think Ryo means Foxfingers instead of Firefox.

OK lets try it this way then.

KitKat, Bludgeon, Megaclone, and Drillbit (Whatever he's doing) are leading
Foxfingers outside.

Start here

She stood up as the foxbot came out of the room. She smiled. She took
a few steps closer to him. "Very well, follow." She turned and
motioned with her foreleg, for him to come along. Her clone stood
there.  It followed behind FoxFinger. KitKat smiled at the fox. "Now
then, why did you break in here? But I must give you credit, you are
a good burgler. You burgle well."  She tried to put her paw on his
shoulder. "You know, if you ever decide to you want some action, or
just a change of pace, please stop by again." She just barely touched
his shoulder. She pulled her paw away, but left a very tiny tracking
device on his shoulder.

 Foxfingers Grabbed KitKats wrist as she touched his shoulder drawing a DNA
sample from the Pred as he did. He gently pushed it aside trying not to show
to agressive of tendancies. "Don't touch me without having those paws
sterilized first." he didn't trust the Pred, there was no profit in trust,
but there was more to it than that. he didn't know if it was his programming
or something more but he deffinitely did not trust her. He heard Bludgeon
chuckle in the background as she touched him. Hethought Bludgeon was
laughing at his wit and let it pass. He asked himself three questions (No
none of them are if he feals lucky.) 1 Why would this Predacon release him
knowing that he has cell samples from Megatrons clone?  2 "What does Kit Kat
have to gain by letting him go?" and 3 "Why does she keep asking the same
question about why he was here when he'd already answered her." He had one
answer for all three, She was stalling for time until either she found a way
to contain him or she was planning to track him. For all he knew she could
have already slipped a tracking device on him.

He looked at her frame, she was slightly bigger than him but he thought he
could still beat her in a fair fight. But she had three others to back her
up where he was alone. "You offered me a deal to join you, What do I gain by
this deal?" Now he was weighing his options and stalling for time.



KitKat leads Foxfingers toward the exit when they're intercepted by Koj and
Inu


 ::Koj::
> Koj lands next to Firefox "Fox were with you on this no matter what
happens
> Maximals got to stick together!" Koj ports shoot the halfs of the Fang.
Koj
> grabs them and snaps the Lance together.Koj takes a 50/50 stance. His
> shoulder plates lift up to reveal the twin tekno Fusion Cannons as they
> start to power up.
>
> ::Inu::
> Inu size gives him a disadvantge to move but in a closed area his breath
is
> more deadly due to limited dodging space."3 Vs. a Army why can't we ever
> escape these odds!"

Foxfingers sees that he was wrong the whole time. He thought that he was the
only Maximal there and that the thought of destruction of the base would
damage more Preds. Now he sees the pointlessness of his gamble. Three lives
lost on both sides would only cause death not victory.

"OK this has just become interesting," Foxfingers states ducking behind his
new protectors. He switches his visual to infra red and looks himself over.
He spots the tracking device on his shoulder. His mind floods with sneaky
ideas for the tracking device. He decides to leave it there for now as a
card to be discarded if his bluff folds. "Easy boys" he tells the two bots
in front of him, "The situations under control for now, lets not do anything
to cause an eruption." He places a hand on the shoulder of each of the other
Maximals (Koj's left and Inu's right.) drawing a cell sample from each. He
recognized them from the CF but was never formally introduced.
